title: Create DOT Example Diagrams
impact: Provides users with DOT diagram templates to learn from

tasks.title: Delete existing Mermaid examples
tasks.description: Delete all .mmd example files from the src/examples/ directory.

implementation.purpose: Remove Mermaid examples before adding DOT examples

stepByStep.details: Run: ls src/examples/ to see all files

tasks.title: Create basic directed graph example
tasks.description: Create a DOT example showing a basic directed graph with nodes and edges.

implementation.purpose: Show basic digraph syntax with labeled nodes and edges
keyDecisions: Show node definitions with labels and shapes

stepByStep.details: Create new file with directed graph content

stepByStep.code:
digraph DirectedGraph {
    rankdir=TB

    // Node definitions
    A [label="Start" shape=ellipse]
    B [label="Process 1" shape=box]
    C [label="Process 2" shape=box]
    D [label="Decision" shape=diamond]
    E [label="End" shape=ellipse]

    // Edges
    A -> B
    B -> C
    C -> D
    D -> B [label="retry"]
    D -> E [label="done"]
}

tasks.title: Create undirected graph example
tasks.description: Create a DOT example showing an undirected graph.

stepByStep.details: Create new file with undirected graph content

stepByStep.code:
graph UndirectedGraph {
    layout=neato

    // Social network example
    Alice -- Bob
    Alice -- Carol
    Bob -- Carol
    Bob -- Dave
    Carol -- Eve
    Dave -- Eve

    // Styling
    Alice [shape=circle color=red]
    Bob [shape=circle color=blue]
    Carol [shape=circle color=green]
}
